data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【多选题】请问您是否玩过<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">电脑版《红色警戒》</font>游戏？</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">玩过《红色警戒》</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（又称"红警95"）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">玩过《红色警戒2》</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">玩过《红色警戒3》</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">没有玩过电脑版《红色警戒》游戏</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【单选题】您对<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">电脑版《红色警戒》</font>的喜好程度如何？（1=非常不喜欢，5=非常喜欢）</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">1</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">2</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">3</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">4</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">5</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【单选题】请问您玩<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">电脑版《红色警戒》</font>的情况是？</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">没有玩过</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">下载以后玩了一两次就没有再玩了</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">玩了1年以下</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">玩了1-3年</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（包括1年）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">玩了3年以上</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（包括3年）</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【多选题】请问您在手机/平板电脑上玩过以下哪些类型的<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">《红色警戒》题材</font>的游戏？</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">SLG-战争策略类</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（如坦克军团：红警归来、战争警戒等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">FPS-射击类</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（如红警帝国：坦克争霸等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">卡牌RPG类</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（如共和国之辉2等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">没有玩过《红色警戒》题材的移动游戏</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">其他，请填写</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【多选题，最多选三项】吸引您<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">参加本次《红警OL》</font>测试的主要原因是？</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">想在手机上玩《红警》这个类型的游戏</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">红色警戒/军事的游戏题材类都会尝试</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">得到《红警》正版授权改编</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">喜欢战争策略类游戏</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">被宣传图片所吸引</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">朋友推荐</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">其它，请填写</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【单选题】您对《红警OL》的对电脑版《红色警戒》的<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">还原度</font>是否满意？（1=非常不满意，5=非常满意）</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">1</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">2</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">3</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">4</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">5</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【单选题】您是否喜欢《红警OL》的美术风格？（1=非常不喜欢，5=非常喜欢）</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">1</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">2</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">3</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">4</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">5</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【多选题】<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">最近半年</font>，您在手机/平板电脑上玩过以下<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">哪些类型</font>的游戏？</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">卡牌类</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（如阴阳师、刀塔传奇等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">RPG类</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（如剑侠情缘、倩女幽魂、梦幻西游等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">战争策略类</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（如列王的纷争、乱世王者等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">动作格斗类</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（如龙之谷、火影忍者、天天炫斗等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">体育运动类</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（如FIFA世界足球、NBA2K 16等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">棋牌类</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（如欢乐斗地主、天天德州等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">枪战射击类</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（如穿越火线、全民枪战等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">MOBA类</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（如王者荣耀、虚荣等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">休闲类</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（天天爱消除、天天酷跑等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">其他，请填写</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【多选题】<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">最近半年</font>，您在手机/平板电脑上玩过以下哪些<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">战争策略类</font>游戏？</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">部落冲突（COC）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">列王的纷争（COK）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">乱世王者</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">率土之滨</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">王国纪元</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">以上都没玩过</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">其他，请填写</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【单选题】<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">最近半年</font>，您在手机/平板电脑上玩游戏时平均每月的<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">付费情况</font>（指在游戏内充值）是？</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">没付过费</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">10元及以下</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">10-100元</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">100-300元</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">300-1000元</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">1000元以上</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【单选题】请问您的性别是？</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">女</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">男</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【单选题】请问您的年龄是？</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">12岁及以下</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">13-15岁</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">16-18岁</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">19-22岁</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">23-25岁</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">26-29岁</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">30-39岁</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">40岁及以上</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【主观题】如果您未来愿意接受我们进一步的深入调研，请留下您的联系方式（如手机号），谢谢！</font>

<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【单选题】<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">整体而言</font>，您对《红警OL》的<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">整体游戏体验</font>是否满意？（1=非常不满意，5=非常满意）</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">1</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">2</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">3</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">4</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">5</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【单选题】您对《红警OL》感到<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">不满意</font>的地方是？</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">场景画面</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">角色外形</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">音乐音效</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">玩法系统</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【多选题，最多选三项】请问您觉得《红警OL》中<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">最不满意的系统</font>是？</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">PVE玩法</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（攻打野外敌军/叛军等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">PVP玩法</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（基地攻防、联盟战争等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">世界地图玩法</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（采集资源、探索尤里实验室、基地迁移等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">单局战斗体验</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（英雄选择、兵种搭配等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">基地建设</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（建筑升级、科技研究等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">联盟系统</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（联盟领地建设、联盟战争、科技捐献、贸易中心等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">交易系统</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（商城、独立军火商等）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">界面布置</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（主场景、核心玩法界面布局、交互方式等）</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【多选题】请问您是否玩过<font color="#BB3126" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">电脑版《红色警戒》</font>游戏？</font>
data.content: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">玩过《红色警戒》</font><font color="#929AA8" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">（又称"红警95"）</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">玩过《红色警戒2》</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">玩过《红色警戒3》</font>|<font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">没有玩过电脑版《红色警戒》游戏</font>

data.title: <font color="#FEFEFE" face = "Helvetica20" size ="20">【主观题】请问您对《红警OL》还有哪些建议？</font>
